description: Update a material unit of measure quantity.
permissions: Allowed when MaterialTransactionPolicy.update? passes for the referenced material transaction: admin users; members of the material transaction broker; members of the material supplier; or users who can update the related trip.
side_effects: Touches the related tender_job_schedule_shift after commit. If quantity changes, may enqueue inventory change scheduling for related material sites when auto-create inventory changes is enabled. On update, associated material transaction inspections are destroyed.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required; at least one of --quantity, --material-transaction, or --unit-of-measure must be provided; if any of those flags are provided, their values cannot be empty; quantity must be between 0 and 200000 (server validates numeric >= 0 and < 200000 unless skip_quantity_validation).
